feature.name: Feature Identity
feature.summary: This feature adds a variable to the UE grouping selection criteria to optimize UE

parameters.name: PrefUeGroupSelectionProfile.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: This feature introduces the pCellOnlyUe                                     selection criteria variable.

parameters.name: UeAdmissionGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: This feature introduces the pCellOnlyUe                                     selection criteria variable.

parameters.name: UeGroupSelectionProfile.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: This feature introduces the pCellOnlyUe                                     selection criteria variable.

parameters.name: UeMobilityGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: This feature introduces the pCellOnlyUe                                     selection criteria variable.

parameters.name: UeServiceGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: This feature introduces the pCellOnlyUe                                     selection criteria variable.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012820 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012820 MO instance.
